About Michael

I'm a user experience designer trapped inside a software engineer's body. I'm currently working as an Advisory Software Engineer in a DevOps role at IBM as part of an agile team that builds and supports the IBM Digital Marketplace.

Prior to working at IBM, I graduated from UNC-Chapel Hill with a Master of Science in Information Science, concentrating in Human-Computer Interaction. Before graduate school, I worked as a web developer.

Other tidbits:

  • I am a Certified Usability Analyst.
  • I have code on GitHub and CodePen.
  • I occasionally answer questions on the StackExchange network (StackOverflow and UX).
  • And I write about various technology and design topics here on my blog.
